== Vellarakkad (627735) ==

Vellarakkad is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 611 hectares and harbouring 1310 households with total population of 5771 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunnamkulam]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 2753 and female population is 3018. Scheduled Caste Population is 881 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 627735<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
